item.title: CVE-2024-4563|2024-06-04T17:56:18.385Z -- progress%20software%20corporation -- moveit%20automation
item.description: The Progress MOVEit Automation configuration export function prior to 2024.0.0 uses a cryptographic method with insufficient bit length.
